ygData.subject: Re: Blue Plate Mail
ygData.msgSnippet: OMG, are u on the karana server, couse i might know the guy whom was selling it.  I had 3 crafted (blue armor) helms  my dad got me. I keeped one, of course
ygData.messageBody:
OMG, are u on the karana server, couse i might know the guy whom was selling
it. I had 3 crafted (blue armor) helms my dad got me. I keeped one, of
course and gave 2 to a good friend.. I told him a could sell one for money.


----Original Message Follows----
From: "John Cynkar" <ref145@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Subject: [warriors_eq] Blue Plate Mail
Date: Thu, 22 Jul 1999 21:39:01 -0500

I know of mithril Armor, very expensive and cool armor, bracers and
Breastplate. Yesterday I ran into a guy whom had a Crafted Helm for sale,
very expensive, better ac than rubicite, and very expensive. Really buff
armor.
